title: Type Club of Toronto
content:
The Type Club of Toronto has posted it's Winter/Spring 2008 roster of events on our revamped website ( [www.typeclub.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020145655/http:/www.typeclub.com/ "www.typeclub.com")).

The first event is on Tuesday, February 26 with Karl Thomson from Compass 360 at the Arts & Letters Club in Toronto.

Full event listings are available at the website and through the Type Club's Facebook page.
author: lindsay smail
